sentences.sContent: I make the same with the vinegar, amino acid which is wonderful and it's from triptophan and other amino acids.
sentences.sContent_eng: I make the same with the vinegar, amino acid which is wonderful and it's from triptophan and other amino acids.
sentences.sCn: 我同样地用醋和氨基酸来制作，那好极了，它来自与色氨酸和其他氨基酸。

sentences.sContent: The high F value few-peptide is one kind of small peptide mixture contain high branch amino acid and low aromatic amino acid.
sentences.sContent_eng: The high F value few-peptide is one kind of small peptide mixture contain high branch amino acid and low aromatic amino acid.
sentences.sCn: 高F值寡肽是一种具有高支链氨基酸含量和低芳香族氨基酸含量组成的小肽混合物。

sentences.sContent: Each codon either codes for an amino acid or tells the cell to stop making a protein chain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each codon either codes for an amino acid or tells the cell to stop making a protein chain.
sentences.sCn: 每一个密码子或者编码一种氨基酸，或者告诉这些细胞停止生产这个蛋白质链。

trans.tranOther: one of the substances that combine to form  protein s
